quote: We have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day. – Charles Swindoll
fact: A literal translation of a standard traffic sign in China: "Give large space to the festive dog that makes sport in the roadway."
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What kind of pants do ghosts wear? Boo jeans.
